1. "Little Fockers" (2010) - This family comedy stars Yul Vazquez as Jack Byrnes, the patriarch of a wealthy family looking to appoint a successor. The movie follows Jack's daughter Laura Dern and her son, played by Justin Hillier. Laura is engaged to an American artist, played by Ben Stiller. Meanwhile, Jack's son-in-law, played by Kevin Hart, tries to win Laura's heart while still being loyal to his beloved wife.
2. "The Trouble with Harry" (1955) - This classic black comedy stars Jerry Mathers as Harry Tiller, a middle-aged businessman who is looking for ways to increase profits. Harry is approached by several local business owners, played by Royal Dano, Alfred Hitchcock, John Forsythe, and others. These individuals are also looking for ways to increase profits, but they have not been able to come up with successful strategies. Harry, on the other hand, has a wealth of experience in business and has already developed many successful strategies. Harry is determined to use his knowledge and experience to help these local business owners develop successful strategies of their own.
